index.intro:
[Yaju Senpai] is an actor in the video series published by Japanese gay porn conpany COAT CORPORATION(OFFICIAL WEBSITE) in 2001 "Babylon 34 真夏の夜の淫夢 theIMP" and acted as a character called "Tadokoro" in it. He appeared in the fourth video called "昏睡レイプ!野獣と化した先輩" and became famous for his appearance. Although he has become an Internet star in Japan, his real name, identity and whereabouts still remains to be known.

> More
